description: A sweet expression of love, likening chocolates to the depth of affection with every bite.
title: Bites of Love
n_1: In a Persian garden, Choco seeks to impress Lover.
n_2: Choco reveals a box, crafted with care.
n_3: Under starlit skies, Lover tastes the gift.
n_4: Embraced, they share the chocolates, bonding deeply.
